genericDeleteDesc: You won't be able to undo this action!

storagePersistence.content: Ampersand cannot store data persistently on your device. If you're on Firefox, please give Ampersand permission to do so. If you're on a Chromium-based browser (such as Chrome, Edge, Opera, Vivaldi, etc...), please install Ampersand as a web app / add it to your Desktop/Home screen. If this message doesn't go away, consider backing up your data often from the Import/Export section.
